verbs.description: The secretary of education [V: has] been one of the most criticized members of President Trump 's Cabinet , but DeVos says she 's " more misunderstood than anything "
[ARG1: The secretary of education] has [V: been] [ARG2: one of the most criticized members of President Trump 's Cabinet] , but DeVos says she 's " more misunderstood than anything "
The secretary of education has been one of the [ARGM-ADV: most] [V: criticized] [ARG1: members] of President Trump 's Cabinet , but DeVos says she 's " more misunderstood than anything "
The secretary of education has been one of the most criticized members of President Trump 's Cabinet , but [ARG0: DeVos] [V: says] [ARG1: she 's " more misunderstood than anything] "
The secretary of education has been one of the most criticized members of President Trump 's Cabinet , but DeVos says [ARG1: she] [V: 's] " [ARG2: more misunderstood than anything] "
